PicoTunnel Dashboard

Welcome to PicoTunnel

This is a placeholder web UI. The React application will be built here once the Go backend is working.

Features Coming Soon:

  • Tunnel management (create, update, delete)
  • Service configuration (HTTP and TCP)
  • Real-time connection status
  • Uptime statistics and history
  • Docker run command generator

API Endpoints:

  • GET /api/tunnels - List all tunnels
  • POST /api/tunnels - Create new tunnel
  • GET /api/tunnels/{id} - Get tunnel details
  • GET /api/tunnels/{id}/services - List services
  • GET /api/tunnels/{id}/stats - Get uptime stats

Quick Start

1. Create a tunnel using the API or wait for the web UI

2. Run the client with your tunnel token:

docker run -d ghcr.io/jclement/picotunnel-client \
  --server your-server.com:8443 \
  --token your-tunnel-token
